heading: HB09172
0: AN ACT GRANTING SCHOLARSHIPS TO PERSONS WITH DISABILITIES (PWDs) AND THEIR CHILDREN AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR AND OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on HIGHER AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION since 2019-05-20
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB09172
FULL TITLE : AN ACT GRANTING SCHOLARSHIPS TO PERSONS WITH DISABILITIES (PWDs) AND THEIR CHILDREN AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR AND OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Intends to ensure that PWDs and their children are provided with adequate access to quality education and ample opportunities to develop their skills through scholarship grants.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : GASATAYA, GREG G.
DATE FILED : 2019-03-28
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HIGHER AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION ON 2019-05-20
